results.title: [Porphyria cutanea tarda induced by HMG CoA reductase inhibitors: simvastatin, pravastatin].
results.text_hl: CASE REPORT: @DISEASE_Porphyria_Cutanea_Tarda @DISEASE_MESH:D017119 @@@Porphyria cutanea tarda@@@ was diagnosed in a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Hepatitis_Alcoholic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006519 @@@chronic alcoholism@@@ 18 months after beginning a treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ followed by @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Perrot JL, Guy C, Bour Guichenez G, Amigues O, Servoz J, Cambazard F. [Porphyria cutanea tarda induced by HMG CoA reductase inhibitors: simvastatin, pravastatin]. Ann Dermatol Venereol. 1994;121(11):817-9. PMID: 7631993
